comment: "Email with key arrived within 24 hours. Accessed the M/S office setup site, entered the key and the whole Office suite was up and running within 15mins. I am running a new Windows10 system and had removed a ‘stub’ office installation prior to this. Excellent process."

comment: "Ordered it late yesterday and it arrived by email this morning. Checked with MS to see if it updated ok (for peace of mind) and it did"
